law.catch_line: Fractional units of weight and measure.
law.text: Fractional parts of any unit of weight or measure shall mean like fractional parts of the value of the unit as prescribed or defined in KRS 363.520 and subsection (13) of KRS 363.510, and all contracts concerning the sale of commodities and services shall be construed in accordance with this requirement.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 49, sec. 23, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 264, sec. 33.
